item.title: Olga add a quote by Lee Kuan Yew
item.description: "I started off believing all men were equal. I now know that's the most unlikely thing ever to have been, because millions of years have passed over evolution, people have scattered across the face of this earth, been isolated from each other, developed independently, had different intermixtures between races, peoples, climates, soils... I didn't start off with that knowledge. But by observation, reading, watching, arguing, asking, and then bullying my way to the top, that is the conclusion I've come to." -- Lee Kuan Yew

item.title: Olga add a quote by Lee Kuan Yew
item.description: "Political reform need not go hand in hand with economic liberalisation. I do not believe that if you are libertarian, full of diverse opinions, full of competing ideas in the market place, full of sound and fury, therefore you will succeed." -- Lee Kuan Yew

item.title: Olga add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Olga add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "As government expands, liberty contracts." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Olga add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Status quo, you know, is Latin for 'the mess we're in'." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Olga add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "Here you discover that so long as books are kept open, then minds can never be closed." -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Olga add a quote by Ronald Reagan
item.description: "If you think you can - you can!" -- Ronald Reagan

item.title: Olga add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "If you just set out to be liked, you will be prepared to compromise on anything at anytime, and would achieve nothing. " -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Olga add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "Europe was created by history. America was created by philosophy." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Olga add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "I do not know anyone who has gotten to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but it will get you pretty near." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Olga add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "Being democratic is not enough, a majority cannot turn what is wrong into right. In order to be considered truly free, countries must also have a deep love of liberty and an abiding respect for the rule of law." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Olga add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "The Russians are bent on world dominance, and they are rapidly acquiring the means to become the most powerful imperial nation the world has seen. The men in the Soviet Politburo do not have to worry about the ebb and flow of public opinion. They put guns before butter, while we put just about everything before guns." -- Margaret Thatcher
